cause.description:
Myself and hundreds of others have teamed up to raise money and awareness for Diabetes. This disease has touched my family and I wanted to do something to make a difference. We are each raising the money and training to do a marathon with Team Diabetes.
The Canadian Diabetes Association is not registered to receive donations but you can donate by going to this link:
https://ocp.diabetes.ca/Pledge/csSearch.asp?prId=td
and type in the participants name (Farris Green)
1. Find a cure
2. Create awareness to prevent the disease
3. Raise money for research
cause.mission: Raise Money and Awareness for Diabetes
cause.name: Team Diabetes
